com.java.model.player

Class FortificationPhaseState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.java.model.player.FortificationPhaseState

  • public class FortificationPhaseState
extends java.lang.Object
    This class models the state of Fortification phase to be presented in phase View.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Arnav Bhardwaj, Karan Dhingra, Ghalia Elkerdi, Sahil Singh Sodhi, Cristian Rodriguez
